trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Marietta
There were no other sightings in Marietta on or around November 30th 1984
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving around 1000 pm on Providence Road near the intersection of RoswellRoad and Johnsons Ferry Road in East Cobb County Georgia. Im not sure of thedate. I can only remember that is was in the Spring of 1985.I dont remember how it cought my attention but I saw a large star above thetrees. Although it was only a star-like light, I could tell that it was near theearth. After about 10 seconds, it moved quickly for a few inches in the sky thenmade an acute turnB130 degrees without stopping. It went made about 3 of these sharp turns andthen shot like a rocket out of the sky.I never felt any real emotions other than surprise. I never called or told manypeople about it. I assumed that the local Dobbins Air Force Base would not havetold me anything and that most people would think I was crazy.Quite frankly, I dont really believe in E.T.s. My only real hope in sending thisis that you will let me know that others saw the same thing.Thanks.
Summary: Starlight makes quick moves and acutes angled turn
